channel.title: Net Neutrality on Nicholas Fox
channel.description: Recent content in Net Neutrality on Nicholas Fox

item.title: The hypocritical silence of “free speech” academics on net neutrality
item.description: Image from Cagle.com - Kevin Siers, Charlotte Observer 2015 Recently there have been several highly publicized protests of speakers on college campuses. Most, but not all, of these speakers have been associated with conservative politics or viewpoints that challenge current ideas on social justice (Ann Coulter, Milo Yiannopoulos, Charles Murray, etc). At Heterodox Academy and across most mainstream news outlets, academics and college administrators have spoken up about the possible threats to free speech on campus posed by student groups protesting to silence these speakers.
